00020 MakeAnalysedPulses::MakeAnalysedPulses(modules::options* opts):
00021    BaseModule("MakeAnalysedPulses",opts,false),fOptions(opts){
00022         fSlowGeneratorType=opts->GetString("default_slow_generator","MaxBin");
00023         fFastGeneratorType=opts->GetString("default_fast_generator","MaxBin");
00024         opts->GetVectorStringsByWhiteSpace("analyse_channels",fChannelsToAnalyse);
00025 }

00030 int MakeAnalysedPulses::BeforeFirstEntry(TGlobalData* gData,TSetupData *setup){
00031     // Loop over every named detector channel in TSetupData
00032     std::vector<std::string> detectors;
00033     setup->GetAllDetectors(detectors);
00034 
00035     // do we analyse all channels?
00036     bool analyse_all=fChannelsToAnalyse.empty();
00037     if(!analyse_all){
00038       for(unsigned i=0;i<fChannelsToAnalyse.size();i++){
00039         if (fChannelsToAnalyse[i]=="all"){
00040           analyse_all=true;
00041           break;
00042         }
00043       }
00044     }
00045     std::cout<<"Will analyse ";
00046     if(analyse_all) std::cout<<"all ";
00047     else std::cout<<fChannelsToAnalyse.size()<<" of ";
00048     std::cout<<detectors.size()<<" channels"<<std::endl;
00049 
00050     // For each channel:
00051     bool skip_detector=false;
00052     std::string des_gen;
00053     for(std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator det=detectors.begin();
00054                     det!=detectors.end();
00055                     det++){
00056        // if we should not analyse det, leave generator as NULL
00057        skip_detector=false;
00058        if(! analyse_all ){
00059           std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator it_chan;
00060           for(it_chan=fChannelsToAnalyse.begin();
00061                           it_chan!=fChannelsToAnalyse.end();
00062                           it_chan++){
00063              if((*it_chan)== (*det)) break;
00064           }
00065           if(it_chan== fChannelsToAnalyse.end() ) skip_detector=true;
00066        }
00067        if(skip_detector){
00068        // fGenerators[*det]=NULL;
00069           continue;
00070        }
00071        // else find the right generator to build
00072        if(fOptions->HasOption(*det)){
00073          // If this channel is named explicitly, use that generator type
00074          bool success=ParseGeneratorList(*det);
00075          if(! success) return 1;
00076        } else{
00077          // else use default value for this type of channel (fast or slow)
00078          if(TSetupData::IsFast(*det)){
00079             if(!AddGenerator(*det,"!FAST!"))
00080                     return 1;
00081          } else {
00082             if(!AddGenerator(*det,"!SLOW!"))
00083                     return 1;
00084          }
00085        }
00086     }
00087     return 0;
00088 }
00089 
00090 int MakeAnalysedPulses::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, TSetupData *gSetup){
00091   // Generator just receives a bunch of TPIs and must return a list of TAPs
00092 
00093   // Loop over each generator
00094   string detname,bankname;
00095   PulseIslandList* thePulseIslands;
00096   ChannelGenerators_t::iterator generator;
00097   AnalysedPulseList theAnalysedPulses;
00098   int retVal=0;
00099   for(generator = fGenerators.begin(); generator != fGenerators.end(); generator++){
00100     // Get the bank name
00101     detname = (*generator)->GetChannel().str();
00102     bankname = gSetup->GetBankName(detname);
00103 
00104     // Get the TPIs
00105     thePulseIslands=&gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap[bankname];
00106     if(thePulseIslands->empty() ){
00107        if( Debug()) cout<<"List of TPIs for '"<< detname<<"' was empty "<<endl;
00108        continue;
00109     }
00110 
00111     // clear the list of analyse_pulses from the last iteration
00112     theAnalysedPulses.clear();
00113 
00114     // generate the new list of analyse_pulses
00115     (*generator)->SetPulseList(thePulseIslands);
00116     retVal=(*generator)->ProcessPulses( *thePulseIslands,theAnalysedPulses);
00117     if(retVal!=0) return retVal;
00118 
00119     // add these into the map of analysed pulses
00120     gAnalysedPulseMap.insert(std::make_pair(detname,theAnalysedPulses));
00121   }
00122   return 0;
00123 }
00124 
00125 // Creates a generator for each one in the list
00126 // Returns true on success or false if there was a problem
00127 bool MakeAnalysedPulses::ParseGeneratorList(std::string detector){
00128         // Get a vector for the generator(s) that we want to use for this detector
00129         std::vector<std::string> generatorList;
00130         fOptions->GetVectorStringsByDelimiter(detector,generatorList);
00131 
00132         //scan to next item in the list
00133         size_t start_br=0;
00134         size_t end_br=std::string::npos;
00135         std::vector<std::string>::iterator gen;
00136         std::stringstream sstream;
00137         std::string arg,generator;
00138         TAPGeneratorOptions* opts;
00139         bool still_good=true;
00140         for(gen=generatorList.begin();gen!= generatorList.end();gen++){
00141             // check if we have options for this generator
00142             start_br=gen->find('(');
00143             generator=GetOneWord(*gen,0,start_br);
00144             if(start_br!=std::string::npos){
00145                 // There are options for this generator
00146                 end_br=gen->find(')');
00147                 sstream.str(gen->substr(start_br,end_br-start_br));
00148                 opts=new TAPGeneratorOptions(detector+"::"+generator);
00149                 for(int count=0; std::getline(sstream, arg,','); count++){
00150                     opts->AddArgument(count,arg);
00151                 }
00152             }
00153             still_good = AddGenerator(detector,generator,opts);
00154             // Is everything ok to continue?
00155             if (!still_good) {
00156                 return false;
00157             }
00158             // Get ready for next iteration
00159             opts=NULL;
00160         }
00161         // Everything went ok, return true
00162         return true;
00163 }
00164 
00165 bool MakeAnalysedPulses::AddGenerator(const string& detector,string generatorType,TAPGeneratorOptions* opts){
00166     // If generatorType is '!FAST!' or '!SLOW!' replace with default value
00167     enum {kFast, kSlow, kArbitrary} requestType;
00168     if(generatorType=="!FAST!") {
00169         generatorType=fFastGeneratorType;
00170         requestType=kFast;
00171     }else if(generatorType=="!SLOW!"){
00172         generatorType=fSlowGeneratorType;
00173         requestType=kSlow;
00174     }else requestType=kArbitrary;
00175 
00176     // Get the requested generator
00177     TVAnalysedPulseGenerator* generator=
00178             TAPGeneratorFactory::Instance()->createModule(generatorType,opts);
00179     if(!generator) return false;
00180     generator->SetChannel(detector);
00181 
00182     // print something
00183     if(Debug()) {
00184         cout<<detector<<": using ";
00185         if (requestType ==kFast) cout<<"default fast: ";
00186         else if (requestType ==kSlow) cout<<"default slow: ";
00187         else cout<<"generator: ";
00188         cout<<generatorType ;
00189         if(opts) cout<<" with "<<opts->GetNumOptions()<<" option(s).";
00190         cout<<endl;
00191     }
00192 
00193     // Add this generator to the list for the required detector
00194     fGenerators.push_back(generator);
00195     return true;
00196 }
